details: Acts on the digestive tract; constipation. Aversion to smell of tobacco. INCLINATION TO VOMIT very marked.

Rectum: Gnawing pain high up in rectum
Constipation; stools hard, covered with mucus
Diarrhoea alternating with hard, lumpy stool, with backache and lassitude, preceded by griping
Stomach: Pain in stomach as from a shock

name: Cascarilla
